荅字的基本解释

荅
dá
同“答1”。
小豆：“菽荅麻麦”。
厚：“荅布皮革千石”。

荅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dá］
［《廣韻》都合切，入合，端。］
(1)小豆。
(2)粗厚；厚重。
(3)即渠答。铁蒺藜，一种御敌的器具。
(4)犹当，对。后作“答”。
(5)见“荅遝”。
(6)容量单位。
[②]［tà］
［《集韻》託合切，入合，透。］
见“荅2焉”。

荅字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荅； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1030第08
【唐韻】【廣韻】都合切【韻會】【正韻】得合切，?音答。【說文】小尗也。【晉書·律歷志】《九章商功法》程菽、荅、麻、麥，一斛積二千四百三十寸。　又當也。【書·洛誥】奉荅天命。【註】又當奉當天命。　又【前漢·鼂錯傳】布渠荅。【註】渠荅，鐵蒺藜也。　又【韻會】引《史記》荅布千疋註：疉布也。　又拉荅。【晉書·王忱傳】拉荅者有沈重之譽，嗛閃者得淸剿之聲。　又【本草】鮓荅。【李時珍曰】鮓荅，生走獸及牛馬諸畜肝膽，有肉囊裹之，多至升許，色白，狀如雞子，非骨非石，打破層疉。　又【韻會】與答通。　又與合通。【史記·貨殖傳】麴蘖、鹽豉、千荅。【註】或作合，器名，有瓵。　又叶韻音的。【易林】隂陽隔塞，許嫁不荅。旄丘新臺，悔往歎息。　又叶韻音篤。【易林】黃鳥采䔰，旣嫁不荅。念我父兄，思復舊谷。又《前漢·貨殖傳》蘗麴鹽豉千合。

answer
Basic explanation of words
answer
dá
Same as "Answer 1".
Adzuki Bean: "Smilax sesame seeds".
Thickness: "Ningbu Leather Thousand Stones".
answer
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dá］
["Guangyun" are all cut, enter and end. ]
(1) Adzuki beans.
(2) Thick; thick.
(3) That is, he answered. Tribulus terrestris, a tool to defend against enemies.
(4) Judang, yes. Then make "Answer".
(5) See "Xing Jiao".
(6) Capacity unit.
[②]［tà］
["Jiyun" supports close, close, and through. ]
See "Xiao 2 Yan".

[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　荅; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1030-08
[Tang Yun] [Guang Yun] All fit together [Yun Hui] [Positive rhyme] All fit together, answer in sound. [Said the text] Xiao Wei also. [Jin Shu·Lü Zhi] "Nine Chapters of Shang Gong Law" Cheng Shu, Niao, Ma, Mai, a total of two thousand four hundred and thirty inches.　Dang Ye again. 【Book·Luogao】According to the mandate of heaven. [Note] It is also to be ordered by the day.　[Previous Han·Xiao Wrong Biography] Distributing Quxun. [Note] Qu Ning, Tribulus terrestris also.　[Yunhui] Quoting "Historical Records" Nian Bu Qian Tu Note: Bu Bu Ye.　 Pull Xun again. [Book of Jin·Wang Chen Biography] Those who pull Xun have a heavy reputation, and those who flicker have the sound of suppression.　[Materia Medica] 鲊荅. [Li Shizhen said] Brachyura, live animals, cattle and horses, liver and gallbladder, are wrapped in meat sacs, as many as ascending, white in color, like a chicken, not bone or stone, breaking the layer.　[Rhyme will] communicate with the answer again.　Connect with it again. [Historical Records · Commodity Transmission] Mochi, Salt Soy, Qian Niao. [Note] Or Zuohe, the name of the instrument, there is 瓵.　Ye Yunyin again. [Yi Lin] Yin and Yang are separated from each other, so you can't marry. Yanqiu Xintai, regretful sigh.　Ye Yunyin again. 【Yi Lin】The yellow bird picks the bird and does not marry. Think of my father and brother, think about the valley of the past. Also "Previous Han · Huo Shi Chuan" Tilling Yeyan Qianhe.

dā, dá
I гл. вм. 答 (отвечать, откликаться; соответствовать)
II сущ./счётн. слово
1) горошина, семечко
2)* гэ (мера в 1/10 升, около 0,104 литра)
III прил.
толстый, плотный, грубый
荅布 плотный (грубый) холст; холстина
